articles.title: Daniel Gafford, Thad Young lead bench blitz in Bulls win - NBC Sports Chicago
articles.description: Gafford was his hyper-energetic self. Young brought veteran skill and playmaking in his season debut. And the Bulls got a needed win, bolstered by their bench.
